body_html:
I've made the modifications and tried to compile, this time getting just one error due to this change related to LLVM API updates (replacing setUnsafeAlgebra() by setFast()). Upgrading LLVM should fix but they will only release v5.0.1 by the end of November.

tensorflow/compiler/xla/service/llvm_ir/llvm_util.cc:560:11: error: no member named 'setFast' in 'llvm::FastMathFlags'
    flags.setFast();
    ~~~~~ ^
body_text:
I've made the modifications and tried to compile, this time getting just one error due to this change related to LLVM API updates (replacing setUnsafeAlgebra() by setFast()). Upgrading LLVM should fix but they will only release v5.0.1 by the end of November.
tensorflow/compiler/xla/service/llvm_ir/llvm_util.cc:560:11: error: no member named 'setFast' in 'llvm::FastMathFlags'
    flags.setFast();
    ~~~~~ ^
body:
I've made the modifications and tried to compile, this time getting just one error due to [this change](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/4e69e02241067129379f73dd4fefe57f0a12bdc9#diff-866fd5845e79e513efd00ed931aa56f5L559) related to [LLVM API updates](https://reviews.llvm.org/rL317488) (replacing `setUnsafeAlgebra()` by `setFast()`). Upgrading LLVM should fix but they will only release v5.0.1 by the end of November.
```
tensorflow/compiler/xla/service/llvm_ir/llvm_util.cc:560:11: error: no member named 'setFast' in 'llvm::FastMathFlags'
    flags.setFast();
    ~~~~~ ^
```
